Text: I can't tell you the \n last time I've seen the \n children so happy.

Fantastic, thank you!

Syd! Come on, \n play with us!

 and took over, said you 
 helped drum up a lot of

Distract? \n Excuse me...

 As soon as I'm back on

 for it.
Fun, that's what!

NOW are you going to \n tell me what you're \n making?

 ask a plumber over 
 at one of the harbour

It's okay, I delivered \n your cargo!

Hey, you're that thief \n who was stealing \n supplies!
What is it?
No problem, just glad I \n could help.

 burglaries. Someone's 
 climbing up the

Never mind, I'll look \n around for some!

 running all over the

 mistaken for a thief.

 has some.

 happened to have some 
 stuff lying around to 
 make them.

One more time!

 have much to spare, but

Well...

Wow, that's \n great to hear!

Huh!?

Could you find Gawan and \n bring me back a screw?
A screw? \n Okay, I'll check. \n Where is he now?

Hmm, guess there's no

Whenever I'm in town, \n I drop by and do what \n I can to help out.
